column3: eminem riddled everyone by posting the squared picture of the equalizer on instagram  the movie with his favorite actor denzel washington  just a day later trailer has arrived  it features sia's singing and eminem most likely singing a  to song this snippet would be from their second collabo with beautiful pain being first  eminem is most likely to do a full soundtrack maybe even a music video for this song andor make a cameo  stay tuned for more info on the song as for the movie it's coming 6th september
